title: Maria I’m Drunk (Demo)
lyrics:
[Part 1: Maria]
[Intro: Travis Scott]
I don't mind if you don't wanna come over

Made it to L.A., yeah
Finally in L.A., yeah
Lookin' for the weed though
Tryna make my own dough
Callin' for Maria
Lost without Maria
Might dive in a marina (Uh, ooh, oh)
[Refrain: Travis Scott]
So trust me, baby, trust me
Trust me, baby, trust me
Trust me, baby, trust me
I don't mind
Trust me, baby, trust me
Trust me, baby, trust me
Trust me, baby, trust me
I don't mind

Them summers in Miami (Them summers in Miami)
Ridin', bumpin' Max B (Ridin' out)
Then I had to hit road
And now I'm finally back home
Ballin' on Maria (I'm ballin' on Maria)
I'm lost without Maria (I'm lost without Maria)
I might dive in, I might swim off in marina
I might do it, I might do it, you remember

[Refrain: Travis Scott]
Trust me, baby, trust me
Trust me, baby, trust me
Baby, trust me, baby, trust me
Baby, I don't mind
Trust me, trust me
Trust me, trust me
Trust me, trust me
Yeah, I don't mind
Oh, mm, whoa

]

]

)
